definition: The term refers to the process of collecting and removing waste materials from a specific location, typically carried out by a designated service or organization. It commonly involves the regular collection of garbage, recyclables, and other forms of waste from residential or commercial areas.

examples.english: The garbage collection comes every Tuesday.

examples.german: Die Müllabfuhr hat den Müll nicht mitgenommen.
examples.english: The garbage collection did not take the trash.

examples.german: Die Müllabfuhr fährt mit großen Lastwagen durch die Straßen.
examples.english: The garbage collection drives through the streets with large trucks.
The garbage collection arrived on time.
The garbage collection empties the trash cans.
